name: A Dog With A Jetpack Delivers Your Mail
name_original: A Dog With A Jetpack Delivers Your Mail
description:
(NOTE: Playing in full screen using the button in the bottom right of the game window is highly recommended!)

Hi, thanks for checking out A Dog With A Jetpack Delivers Your Mail!

This game is a submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. I decided to take the theme of "joined together" and explore how many connections in a line a player can handle. In this game, you take the role of a dog (with a jetpack, ofcourse) and are tasked with delivering mail around the map. However, the only way to carry the mail around is by tethering each delivery to the previous one! This means you'll be carrying mail around the sky in one big line of deliveries.

Plan out your route ahead of time, since once you pick up a delivery, there's no easy way of re-ordering it in the queue! You'll need to make these deliveries in a timely manner to stave off the clock, but watch out for obstacles while you do! Too many hits may send the mail you're carrying tumbling to the ground...

That's about it, hope you enjoy!

- Owen
